column2: The Hellenistic religion is polytheistic, with a pantheon of twelve major gods including Jupiter, Mars, Mercury, Venus, Minerva and Vesta. It originated in ancient Greece and with the conquests of Alexander the Great and the Roman Empire, it would go on to become the dominant religion in the Mediterranean world until the rise of Christendom. Defining features in-game: \n§Y*§! Can try to reconquer the land of the old Roman Empire from non-pagan rulers.\n§Y*§! Can liberate Italian and Greek provinces from non-pagan rulers.
column3: L'hellénisme est polythéiste, avec un panthéon de douze dieux majeurs incluant Jupiter, Mars, Mercure, Venus, Minerve et Vesta. Il est originaire de la Grèce antique et avec les conquête d'Alexandre le Grand et l'Empire romain, allait devenir la religion dominante autour de la Méditerranée jusqu'à la montée du Christianisme. Dans le jeu : \n§Y*§! Peut tenter de recapturer les terres du vieil Empire romain dirigées par des non païens.\n§Y*§! Peut libérer les provinces italiennes et grecques dirigées par des non païens.

column2: Hellenic pagan rulers can liberate Italian and Greek provinces from the tyrannical rule of the monotheistic religions.
column3: Les païens hellènes peuvent libérer les provinces italiennes et grecques du joug tyrannique des religions monothéistes

column2: Hellenic pagan rulers can make a bid at reclaiming the legacy of ancient Rome.

The Aedile is an office with a history as old as the Republic itself. It began with many powers, including the administration of festivals and public order in the City of Rome, but over the course of centuries its powers and responsibilities diminished. Before the office was abolished it dealt only with licentiousness and disorder, in particular over the baths and brothels, as well as the registration of prostitutes.

The Censor is responsible for taking the census of the realm. While the office was originally instituded for taxation purposes the most important duty of the Censor is to supervise public morality and recommend suitable candidates for public offices.
column3: Le Censeur est responsable du recensement dans le royaume. Même si la position a été à l'origine instaurée pour la taxation, la responsabilité la plus importante du Censeur est de superviser la moralité publique et de recommander des candidats aux fonctions publiques

column2: Originally a very powerful office second only to the Dictator, the Magister Equitum, or Master of the Horse, is now a mostly ceremonial, but still prestigious, military function.
column3: A l'origine une position très puissante second après celui de Dictator, le Magister Equitum, ou Maître de cavalerie, est maintenant une fonction militaire principalement céremoniale mais néanmoins toujours prestigieuse.

column2: The Flamen Dialis is the high priest of Jupiter.
column3: Le Flamen Dialis est le haut prêtre du dieu Jupiter.

column2: As wife of the Flamen Dialis, the Flaminica Dialis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
column3: En tant que femme du Flamen Dialis, la Flaminica Dialis a la charge de pratiquer certains rituels religieux.

column2: The Flamen Martialis is the high priest of Mars.
column3: Le Flamen Martialis est le haut prêtre du dieu Mars

column2: As wife of the Flamen Martialis, the Flaminica Martialis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
column3: En tant que femme du Flamen Martialis, la Flaminica Martialis a la charge de pratiquer certains rituels religieux.

column2: The Flamen Quirinalis is the high priest of Quirinus.
column3: Le Flamen Quirinalis est le haut prêtre du dieu Quirinus

column2: As wife of the Flamen Quirinalis, the Flaminica Quirinalis are entrusted to performs certain religious rituals.
column3: En tant que femme du Flamen Quirinalis, la Flaminica Quirinalis a la charge de pratiquer certains rituels religieux.

column2: This character is a member of the College of the Vestales, and has dedicated 30 years of her life in service to the goddess Vesta.
column3: Cette personne est un membre du collège des Vestales, et a dédié 30 ans de sa vie au service de la déesse Vesta.

column2: This character has completed her 30 years of service in the College of the Vestales.
column3: Cette personne a terminé ces 30 ans de service au Collège des Vestales.

column2: The College of the Vestales is the foremost order of priestesses of the Hellenic religion, each member taking a vow of chastity in order to devote themselves to the study and correct observance of religious rituals.
column3: Le Collège des Vestales est l'ordre de prêtresses le plus en vue de l'hellénisme, chaque membre faisant vu de chasteté pour pouvoir se dévouer à l'étude et au respect des rituels religieux.

column2: As the head of the College of the Vestales and the only female member of the College of Pontiffs, the Vestalis Maxima is the most important of the high priestesses of the Hellenic religion.
column3: En tant que chef du Collège des Vestales et unique membre féminin du Collège des Pontiffs, la Vestalis Maxima est la plus importante des hautes prêtresses de l'hellénisme.

column2:
Prometheanism is the worship of the Titan Prometheus and, to a lesser extent, his brother Epimetheus, as the fathers of humanity. Prometheanism acknowledges the existence, and divinity, of the Olympians, but rejects their worthiness as beings to be worshiped. Prometheans value intellectual pursuits above all, finding guile, diplomacy, and a quick wit to be the highest art forms. They find violence distasteful, but recognize that it is ocassionally necessary.Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Prometheans gain piety while at peace.
§Y*§! The Scholarch of the First Academy leads the Promethean faitfhul.
§Y*§! Prometheans cannot use, and are not targetable by, the Pagan Subjugation CB.
§Y*§! Prometheans gain a bonus to Learning.
§Y*§! Prometheanism is a feminist faith.
§Y*§! Women may hold temples.
§Y*§! Priests can marry.
§Y*§! Promethean rulers may designate their heir.
Promethean beliefs encourage intellectual pursuits and the advancements of science, technology, and logic. Promethean tend toward higher education as a result.

The Titan Cult rejects the authority of the Olympian Gods, considering them usurpers and unworthy of their worship. Titan Cultists reject the kind of civilization that Hellenism has typically fostered, and have much more in common with the more "barbaric" religions. They are extremely aggressive and prone to collapse during a succession. Defining features in-game:
§Y*§! Titan Cultists may use the Pagan Subjugation CB once per lifetime.
§Y*§! Titan Cultists may use the Pagan Conquest CB.
§Y*§! Priests can marry.
§Y*§! Titan Cultists lose prestige if at peace too long.
§Y*§! Titan Cultists do not gain an opinion penalty from having vassal levies raised too long.
§Y*§! Titan Cultists can raid their neighbors.
§Y*§! Titan Cultists can take up to three concubines.
§Y*§! The Titan Cult allows marriage between children and their parent's siblings.
§Y*§! Titan Cultists suffer from increased short reign penalties.
Titan Cultists relish and excel in personal combat.
